about.details:
Incorporated in December 2019, Nukleus Office Solutions Limited offers co-working and managed office spaces in Delhi NCR, featuring furnished and flexible workspaces like dedicated desks, private cabins, meeting rooms, startup zones, and virtual offices. 

The company offers various office solutions for startups, SMEs, large enterprises, professionals, and entrepreneurs. They provide fully serviced workspaces for 50-500 seat enterprises.

As of December 31, 2024, the company operated 7 flexible workspaces and 4 Managed Offices in the Delhi NCR, providing 2,796 total seats with 88.48% occupancy.

As of December 31, 2024, the company had a total of 30 employees in various departments.

Competitive Strength

  • Efficient management, flexibility, and high-quality service create a proven record for managing co-working and office spaces effectively.
  • Customisable workspace along with flexible membership options
  • Hybrid model catering to diverse demand
  • Infrastructural development and integration of new technology in our centres.
  • Experienced Promoters and efficient Management Team

faqs.question: What is the Nukleus Office Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Nukleus Office Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 1354800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹31.70 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹234 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on February 24, 2025, and closes on February 27, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Nukleus Office Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Nukleus Office Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Nukleus Office Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Nukleus Office Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Nukleus Office Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Nukleus Office Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Nukleus Office Solutions IPO opens on February 24, 2025 and closes on February 27, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Nukleus Office Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Nukleus Office Solutions IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Nukleus Office Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Nukleus Office Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Nukleus Office Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Nukleus Office Solutions IPO will be done on Friday, February 28, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, March 3, 2025. Check the Nukleus Office Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Nukleus Office Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Nukleus Office Solutions IPO listing date is on Tuesday, March 4, 2025.
